name: InTrack
summary: InTrack IOS SDK. InTrack helps you sending the right message at the right time via the right channel to your customers.
description: InTrack marketing automation platform is a solution to your businessâ€™ marketing automation needs. inTrack enables businesses to manage their communication channels with their customers and plan impressive campaigns. You can tailor your messages to be uniquely personalized to each of your user segments, and send them via a variety of channels such as Email, SMS, and web and app push notifications.
